answers.answer: I'll start :)My due date was August 29, but the c-section is scheduled for August 20. But I am honestly wondering if i'll make it another 10 days. I never went into labor with my first, so this is all so new to me.first of all, my BP went up Saturday. It was back down a bit yesterday, but I am still paranoid about getting preeclampsia again. Luckily, I see the dr every Monday and Thursday.I've been having BH for months, but I think I am starting to get contractions. They start in my lower back and are much more intense than my period cramps. They then wrap around to the front. There were only 2 that REALLY hurt yesterday though. Of course, they stopped over night, and I haven't had much of anything today.I got morning sickness this morning?!? It's been months since I had the pleasure of puking for no reason first thing in the morning.Changes in discharge (although i don't think i've lost my mucous plug)My body is definitely cleaning itself out. I don't know if I truly have to poop this much, or am just making myself go because everything is so tight it feels like I have to. But my intestines are definitely cleaned out.It's not that I'm in a rush... I just want to know when! I have a lot of last minute things to be done right before the baby comes that I can't do in advance- mostly get stuff ready for whoever watches DD.

I'm still waiting as well.  Going back to the doc tomorrow afternoon.  I'm not due until the 22nd, but last Thursday I was 3cm and 80% effaced.  Finally had my first experience with contractions this weekend after our friends threw us a baby shower with mexican food!  Had 1-2 minute long contractions that hurt something awful from about 6:30 Saturday night until after midnight, and they were from 2-3 minutes apart, but never fell into a pattern.How are you feeling?  What day are you due?

I'm waiting too. Scheduled for an induction Aug 20..I really want him to come sooner, I've been having a huge anxiety about being induced and I'm not sure why because I've done it before. I think part of it is this is my last pregnancy and I'd like to have his just come on his own lol. I have an appt on Thursday my last appointment I was barely starting to dialate...so I'm crossing my fingers.

edd 08/09/09 and still here 3cm 70 % as of last wednesday, contractions every day but stubborn jan doesnt want to come out:)hope it will happened soongood luck all still waiting and congrats to all already enjoying there babies
wrong tracker

Well, I"m still here too.  My original DD was 8/28, but the doc moved it up because baby was measuring big, so he says 8/22.  As of last Thursday, I"m not dilated at all, and he didn't tell me anything about effacement.  He's definitely getting lower, as my belly button is finally starting to poke out a little.  I have had diarrhea (sorry, TMI) for the past 3 or so days, but I"m not sure if that is from the Cipro I'm on for my UTI, or just my body getting ready.  I have been having some pain down low, but no definite contractions that I can tell anyway.  I am so done being preggo.  I also have started back up with being nauseated in the mornings, mostly due to phlegm.  And I still can't eat anything large, it makes me nauseated as well.  But then I feel like I'm starving, so I don't know anymore.  God knows this kid will come in September, the way I'm feeling!

i am still here too (if you haven't noticed from all my posting lol)  thought for sure saturday was going to be it....even woke everyone up at 3 am, got my bag finished, took a hot shower and the contractions disappeared!!  :(  i am like jenn, diarrhea, vomiting, etc.  i see my doctor again wednesday and he told me at my last appointment that he would induce me by the 17th if nothing happened (EDD 8-24)  so i am going to ask if he can do it the 16th.  ugghh, so close, yet so far away!!  lol  good luck ladies, i am sending LOTS of labor dust your way!! :)

i am going with my dh wednesday to pick his daughteerr from thee airport and we always park on us airport parking from which they take us to the airport and its a bumpy ridde so i keep my fingers crossed that maybe that bupy bus ride will help push that baby out,
My c-section is tomorrow (8/11)!!!!!!!Good luck ladies!!
good luck, rdh and congrats ahead of time!!!  :)

well im still here and not real happy about it. My two older kids were 7-10 days early, so this is frustrating for me! I'm not technically overdue until the 15th tho... my doc originally gave me a due date of Aug 15. It was the Peri that changed it to 8/9/09 according to early u/s's etc etc... however, I guess my doc is more accurate - not a huge shocker... he's a smart guy! lol  anyway, i was 2cm and 70% effaced as of last friday... doc also said i was "ripe and ready" so i'm just waiting... he said he wouldn't let me go past my due date as babe is big and i dont have a risk of c-section(being induced) because my cervix is ripe, so i guess we'll just have to see what happens... the waiting ***** tho! I'm ready to start BF'g and getting back into an exercise routine so I can rejoin society already!

I'm not technically overdue until the 15th tho... my doc originally gave me a due date of Aug 15. My appointment went well. Apparently my BP is still good. He did warn me that I will probably get very swollen this week from the heat, and that I'll just keep getting more and more uncomfortable. Oh joy :P  But then he added that he'd rather see me uncomfortable than have to take the baby early.
Well i'm still here too. My EDD is the 31st August and it still seems so far away. I'm hoping this one will come early since its my 3rd.Anyway good luck everyone.

Good luck with that munter, this is #7 for me and looks like he is in no hurry. I am also still here my edd is 8/20 and all I can do is sit and wait and wait and wait. My midwife checked me on Monday and I have only dilated 1 and half . I expected to be more up, but 1 and half that is just crazy!!!!
why did it post mine 3 times??? Weird...

I'm still here. Spent last night in L&D with contractions at 3 minutes apart. I thought it was the real deal, but after they gave me pain meds to help me rest things slowed down to 7 minutes and I was sent home. I'm 3cm and almost fully effaced so the nurse thinks sometime in the next few days while my ob guessed next week. That's the soonest she will break my bag and help progress labor.I'm tired and sore and my hips hurt. After going to the hospital last night and hearing babies being born all around me I'm ready to meet this little girl.
i'm still waiting and wish i wasn't. i'm 3 days overdue...was due on the 8th and still no sign of my little man.

at least i am not overdue...i think i would be much, much worse if i were...i have been a crabby witch all day and been really nauseated, maybe this is a sign of impending labor?!?  wish i had $900 dollars to contact psychic sylvia brown, maybe she could tell me!!  lol  ;)

getting induced tomorrow morning at 5 am... very nervous as this is my 1st induction... doc says my cervix is good and ripe so it should be a breeze... let's hope he's right! I would probably let it go longer if my blood pressure wasnt high... that makes me nervous so it looks like we're having a baby tomorrow morning - YAY!

jaxxx~  congrats and good luck!! :)  everything will be fine!!well i got back from my o.b. and they are going to induce me on tuesday the 18th at 7 a.m., so it looks like that's my day!!  he said all he has to do is break my water...baby is right there!!

question: Congrats to all who have delivered! This post is for everyone else :)  Don't want to feel like I'm the only one left...Who's still waiting? How are you feeling?
title: Roll Call- Who's still waiting?!?
